entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -24.1°C
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -32.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
